root.name: Sengoku Basara 3 Utage
root.description: OverviewSengoku Basara 3: Utage (戦国Ｂasara ３: 宴) is a follow-up to Sengoku Basara: Samurai Heroes for both the PlayStation 3 and Wii. The game will make numerous characters that appeared in the previous game as NPCs fully playable. In total, the game will feature thirty playable characters, six of whom will be brand new. The game will feature multiple gameplay modes as well, including a story mode and country unification mode.Official website
